ovdesc.p: The LC.CLAUSES file holds narrative static information data for use in the mapping and construction of L/C Advices/Documents generated as a result of L/C transactions within the T24 Delivery Application.

desc.p: This is the key to the LC.CLAUSES file.
During the input of an L/C this code can be entered for the inclusion of standard clauses.
It can accept either of below values
Customer Number - Text,Text can be 1-6 type A (Alphanumeric) characters.
Customer Number should exists in CUSTOMER table
Applicant customer – Inco Terms – Mode of Shipment
Applicant customer – Inco Terms – Mode of Shipment
Contains the full clause text which is used in the construction of L/C Advices/Documents generated as a result of L/C transactions.
Contains a short meaningful description of the LC.CLAUSES narrative for enrichment purposes.
Free format text that is descriptive of the full clause text.
